The claim states that Coca: Cola has bought the rights to Dr Pepper and will be discontinuing production of the latter soft drink. The expert's verdict clarifies that this claim is false and that the Dr Pepper brand is owned by the Dr Pepper Snapple Group, not Coca-Cola or any other entity.
The expert: s verdict addresses the misconception that the closure of the Dublin Dr Pepper bottling plant in 2012 meant the end of overall Dr Pepper production. It clarifies that while the Dublin plant ceased production, it did not affect the production of Dr Pepper as a whole.
